entry.value:
{"controlHints":[{"text":"The connection name will appear in dropdowns. 
Changing the name will not break any actions.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P7_C64_"},{"text":"Choose the driver appropriate to your database. 
Different drivers can be added by advanced users.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P7_C65_"},{"text":"The JDBC connection string appropriate to the selected driver.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P7_C66_"},{"text":"Connection adapters can provide advanced functionality when database connections are established. 
Such as pass-through authentication, and connection pooling.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P7_C67_"},{"text":"The user name to use with the database connection, if required.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P7_C68_"},{"text":"The password to use with the database connection, if required.","style":"","type":"hover","controlId":"rapid_P7_C69_"}]}
